Sam Goodman 's biography of the Spartan general Xenophanes conveys a vivid sense of the difficulties he faced in his research. In the previous sentence, does the pronoun "he" refer to Goodman? Yes or no?
No.

When Tatyana reached the cabin, her mother was sleeping. She was careful not to disturb her, undressing and climbing back into her berth. In the previous sentence, does the pronoun "she" refer to mother? Yes or no?
No.

Yes.

Do you suppose that Peter is responsible for the captain ’s illness? Maybe he bribed the cook to put something in his food. In the previous sentence, does the pronoun "he" refer to Peter? Yes or no?
No.
